name: Parallel (itch)
description:
Parallel is a game made by Reeve Cutler (Damask Dreams) in RPG Maker VX Ace.  

       An unsuccessful author lives alone in his isolated house. He dreams of other worlds, full of adventures and stories he could write about. One night, a young girl appears in his dreams and asks him to write a forest for her. Will this story have a happy ending?  

       This game has been created for the My First Game Jam, your feedback will be very much appreciated!  

There's a small bug that appeared to some people but not to everyone? If you get to a dark map with three columns and a rock but there's nothing on the rock, restart the game and it will be there. I can't find what is causing this, sorry for the inconvenience.

Estimated play time: less than 15 minutes.
